original: 濟南郡人，董卓廢少帝改立獻帝後，被任命為三公之一的司空，李傕弄權時，又改任司徒。後因故罷職免官。
text: A native of Jinan County, Dong Zhuo was appointed as one of the three emperors after Emperor Dong Zhuo was turned into Emperor Lixian, and when Li Su was given power, he was changed to Situ. He was dismissed from office for some reason.
